     when [space v] key pressed
      play sound (Meow v) until done

```
     when [space v] key pressed
      if <touching (mouse pointer v)?> then
      play sound (Meow v) until done

```
     when [space v] key pressed
      if <touching (Ballon1 v)?> then
      play sound (Meow v) until done 
    ```

```

      if <touching color [#165e0f] ?> then
      say (I found a tree!) for (2) seconds 
    ```

```
     when [space v] key pressed
      change size by (10)
      if <(size) = (200)> then 
    ```

```
     when [space v] key pressed
      change size by (10)
      if <(size) = (200)> then

      play sound (Pop v) until done

```
     when green flag clicked
      ask [Number:] and wait
      if <(answer) > (0)> then
      say [Positive] for (2) seconds 
    ```

```
     when green flag clicked
      ask [Number:] and wait
      if <(answer) > (0)> then
      say [Positive] for (2) seconds
      else
      say [Negative] for (2) seconds 
    ```

```
     when green flag clicked
      ask [Number:] and wait
      if <(answer) > (0)> then
      say [Positive] for (2) seconds
      else
      if <(answer) < (0)> then
      say [Negative] for (2) seconds
      else
      say [Zero] for (2) seconds 
    ```

```
     when green flag clicked
      go to x: (-150) y: (-25) 
    ```

```
     when [right arrow v] key pressed
      move (10) steps 
    ```

```
     when [right arrow v] key pressed
      move (10) steps
      if <touching (edge v)?> then
      say (round (timer)) for (2) seconds 
    ```

```
     when [right arrow v] key pressed
      move (10) steps
      if <touching (edge v)?> then
      if <(timer) < (5)> then
      say [Fast!] for (2) seconds
      else
      say [Slow!] for (2) seconds 
    ```

```
     when [right arrow v] key pressed
      change x by (5) 
    ```

```
     when [right arrow v] key pressed
      change x by (5)
      if <touching color [#ff0000] ?> then
      go to (random position v) 
    ```

```
     when [left arrow v] key pressed
      change x by (-5)
      if <touching color [#ff0000] ?> then
      go to (random position v) 
    ```

```
     when [up arrow v] key pressed
      change y by (5)
      if <touching color [#ff0000] ?> then
      go to (random position v)

      when [down arrow v] key pressed
      change y by (-5)
      if <touching color [#ff0000] ?> then
      go to (random position v) 
    ```
